instruction.value: Instill into conjuctiva of LEFT eye.
Instill into conjuctiva of LEFT eye. Wait 3 minutes between administering additional drop.
Instill into conjuctiva of RIGHT eye.
Instill into conjuctiva of RIGHT eye. Wait 3 minutes between administering additional drop.
Instill into conjuctiva of affected eye(s).
Instill into conjuctiva of affected eye(s). Wait 3 minutes between administering additional drop.
Instill into conjuctiva of BOTH eyes.
Instill into conjuctiva of BOTH eyes. Wait 3 minutes between administering additional drop.
